short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple kanji translator that creates a popup!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension for creating popups with kanji translations and readings. It's a fantastic tool for learning kanji and can save you valuable time.

This extension is powered by the kanjiapi.dev API.

We'd love to hear your feedback! Feel free to leave suggestions in the reviews, and donâ€™t forget to rate us if you enjoy using the extension. 

Happy studying <3
